            What is the difference between this For Him Cologne Spray and the For Him Concentrated Cologne Oil?

            Both products contain the same signature For Him fragrance. The difference comes down to concentration and application method. The oil is a smaller bottle, but more concentrated. This For Him product is a spray for easier application.

            Where do I spray the fragrance on my body?

            Apply the given product to your heat points, also known as pulse points. These points are behind the ears, along the jawline and at the wrists. These are the nooks where your body naturally emits more heat and maximizes the effect of the product.

            Can I spray this on my clothing?

            Because our products are all-natural and alcohol-free, we do not recommend spraying directly onto clothing. The fragrance needs skin contact to work with your body's natural chemistry. Apply direct to skin to prevent any staining and loss of effects.

            How long does RawChemistry pheromone infused fragrance last? How often do I need to reapply?

            The length a scent lasts depends on the wearer’s skin. For drier skin, to maintain freshness it typically requires application every 6 or so hours due to the skin absorbing quickly. For more oily skin, the product may stay fresh as long as 10 hours.

            How natural are the RawChemistry products?

            Very natural. No silicones. No parabens. We keep our products as raw as our name implies. Rooted in a belief that what we put on our bodies matter, we provide a natural product that truly delivers a holistic health experience for your daily routine.

            Elevate Your Presence

            How to Apply & Directions


            1. Spritz 2-3 pumps into the air and walk through the mist, making sure the scent comes into contact with your pulse points and skin only.
            2. These points are behind the ears, along the jawline and at the wrists.
            3. These are the nooks where your body naturally emits more heat and maximizes the lasting effect of the fragrance.
            4. Allow the Silky Smooth, Moisturizing Blend to sit to Increase Pheromones Absorption
            5. Enjoy One of The Best Scented Colognes for Men

                    How customer reviews and ratings work

                    Customer Reviews, including Product Star Ratings help customers to learn more about the product and decide whether it is the right product for them.

                    To calculate the overall star rating and percentage breakdown by star, we don’t use a simple average. Instead, our system considers things like how recent a review is and if the reviewer bought the item on Amazon. It also analyzed reviews to verify trustworthiness.

                    5.0 out of 5 stars Raw Chemistry cologne
                    Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
                    Verified Purchase
                    I recently purchased the Raw Chemistry Men Cologne and I must say, it is truly an amazing product. From the moment I sprayed it on, I knew I had found my new go-to cologne.

                    The scent of this cologne is absolutely fantastic. It has a unique, masculine fragrance that is both bold and captivating. It is not overpowering, but rather leaves a lingering, irresistible scent that is sure to turn heads. Whether I'm at work, out on a date, or attending a special event, this cologne never fails to leave a lasting impression.

                    What sets this cologne apart from others I have tried is its longevity. Many colognes lose their scent after just a few hours, but not this one.
